channel.title: Update my Server | READ PLEASE ! | Update my server
channel.description:
hey guys, so after i have made changes and i want them in game, i have to compile and just run agin? because its not working.. im trying to make some changes (example, adding shop items) but after i compile it and try to run, the change is just not happend .... Please help me
Btw im using Matrix 704

item.title: Update my Server | READ PLEASE ! | Update my server
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

Yes, you need to compile to apply the changes to your server. Could you post your compiler code?

Read full topic
